mapper.select: SELECT addr.no addr_no, m.name name, addr_postal, addr_road, addr_detail, addr_phone phone, addr_msg, a.price pro_price, a.saleprice pro_saleprice, a.discount pro_discount FROM address addr, (SELECT no, name FROM member WHERE no = #{member_no}) m, ( SELECT SUM(cart_price * CART_QTY) price, SUM(cart_saleprice*CART_QTY) saleprice, SUM(cart_price * CART_QTY) - SUM(cart_saleprice*CART_QTY) discount FROM cart WHERE member_no=#{member_no} ) a WHERE addr.member_no = m.no AND addr_main = 1

SELECT pao.pro_option_name AS option_name, pro.no AS pro_no, pao.pro_option_detail_name AS option_detail, pro.pro_name AS pro_name, pro_thumbnail, op.ord_pro_qty AS pro_qty, op.ord_pro_price AS pro_price, TO_CHAR(ord_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd') AS day, ord_id AS id FROM ( SELECT pao.no no, poc.pro_option_name pro_option_name, pod.pro_option_detail_name pro_option_detail_name FROM pro_add_option pao , ( SELECT pro_option_code,pro_option_name FROM pro_option ) poc,( SELECT pro_option_detail_code,pro_option_detail_name FROM pro_option_detail ) pod WHERE poc.pro_option_code = pao.pro_option_code AND pod.pro_option_detail_code = pao.pro_option_detail_code ) pao, orders_product op, product pro, orders ord WHERE op.pro_add_option_no = pao.no(+) AND op.pro_no = pro.no AND ord.no = op.ord_no AND ord_id=#{id} ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ord_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd')
